info.title: Public API
info.description: Welcome to the Piggy API documentation. The Postman Docs are mainly for testing purposes. Please refer to our Piggy API Documentation for guides, explanations and any other questions you may have. Good luck! ---

tags.name: OAuth v3
tags.description:
Use the OAuth Client Credentials Grant to allow for server-to-server communication. This involves handling requesting access tokens and refreshing your own token.

Please check the introduction for more information about OAuth authorization.

tags.name: OAuth v3 > Clients > Contact Session Tokens
OAuth v3 > Clients > Loyalty Transaction Attributes
Register v3
tags.description: Use the Register API key collected from the [Business Dashboard](https://business.piggy.eu).

tags.name: Register v3 > Loyalty > Loyalty Transaction Attributes

data.name: New contact = free voucher for test 123

contact_uuid.description: (string, required) Contact for whom the automation is to be triggered

automation_uuid.description: (string, required) The automation to be triggered

data.description: (array, optional) An array of data that can be used in the automation

parameters.name: contact_uuid
parameters.description: (string, required) The contact you want to list the rewards yet to be collected for

data.name: previous_loyalty_balance
data.label: Previous credit balance
data.description: The value of the credit balance before the last transaction was applied.

data.name: loyalty_number_of_transactions
data.label: Number of transactions
data.description: The number of loyalty transaction the contact has had

data.name: loyalty_first_transaction_date
data.label: First credit reception date
data.description: The date that the contact got their first points

data.name: loyalty_last_transaction_date
data.label: Last transaction date
data.description: The date of thecontact's most recent loyalty transaction

data.name: channel
data.label: Channel
data.description: The channel through which this contact was created

data.name: updated_at
data.label: Updated at
data.description: The date the contact was last updated

data.name: created_at
data.label: Created at
data.description: The date on which the contact was created

data.name: is_anonymous
data.label: Anonymous
data.description: This contact has not been verified and uses a fictive email address

data.name: loyalty_associated_shops
data.label: Associated shops
data.description: All of the shops where this contact has had loyalty transactions

data.name: loyalty_total_credits_received
data.label: Total credits received
data.description: The total number of credits the contact have received to date

data.name: tier
data.label: Tier
data.description: The tier the contact is assigned to

data.name: subscription_status_3
data.label: Subscription status: double opt-in
data.description: The current status for the double opt-in subscription type.

data.name: subscription_status_1
data.label: Subscription status: Marketing
data.description: The current status for the Marketing subscription type.

data.name: subscription_status_5
data.label: Subscription status: OOpt= out
data.description: The current status for the OOpt= out subscription type.

data.name: subscription_status_4
data.label: Subscription status: Opt = in
data.description: The current status for the Opt = in subscription type.

contact_identifier_value.description: (string, required) The value of the identifier (e.g., the loyalty card's hash)

contact_uuid.description: (string, optional) The Contact's UUID for whom the identifier is to be created. Leave empty if you want to link it to a contat later

contact_identifier_name.description: (string, optional) A name for the Contact Identifier

parameters.name: contact_identifier_value
parameters.description: (required) The unique value for the Contact Identifier

contact_identifier_value.description: (required, string) The unique value for the contact identifier that you want to link to the contact

contact_uuid.description: (required, string) The contact uuid that needs to be linked to the contact identifier

data.message: An email containing a link to verify your email has been sent to nizlslzvzrt_42@hytmxil.cym. Please check your spam / junk as well.

parameters.description: (numeric, optional) Page number, default = 1

parameters.description: (numeric, optional) Number of contacts to retrieve (default = 30, maximum = 100)

shop_uuid.description: (string, required) - A valid shop uuid for the user; Get the list using the /shops resource

credits.description: (number, required if unit_value not set) The number of credits to be given, overrides loyalty rules if set on program

unit_value.description: (number, required if credits not set) - The value for which credits are to be given, subject to loyalty rules if set on program

pos_transaction_uuid.description: (string, optional) The POS transaction UUID that you want to link the credit reception to

unit_name.description: (number, required if credits not set) - The name of the unit linked to the value

credits.description: (number, required if unit_value not set) The number of credits to be given, overrides loyalty rules if set on program

parameters.name: contact_uuid
parameters.description: (string, required) The UUID of the Contact for whom the credit reception is to be created.

parameters.name: shop_uuid
parameters.description: (string, required) A valid shop UUID for the user

parameters.name: unit_value
parameters.description: (number, required) The value for which credits are to be given, subject to loyalty rules if set on program

parameters.name: unit_name
parameters.description: (string, optional) Name of the unit for the corresponding value. If both unit_name and credits are not set, then the default unit is used

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: (optional, string) Status of Forms to be retrieved, possible values: PUBLISHED,  DRAFT, BIN

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (optional, string) Type of Forms to be retrieved, possible values: PUBLIC, PRIVATE

type.description: (integer, required) Giftcard type - 0: Physical, 1: Digital. Only the creation of digital giftcards is supported at this time.
(integer, required) Giftcard type - 0: Physical, 1: Digital. Only the creation of digital giftcards is supported at this time.

version.description: (string, required) A version number indicating which token version you are using.

shop_uuid.description: (string, required) The shop uuid of the shop that is providing the credits

unique_id.description: (string, required) A unique id generated by the device that is creating the token (this value should be unique across all your future tokens)

version.description: (string, required) v1 for credits, v2 for units

shop_uuid.description: (string, required) The shop uuid of the shop that is providing the credits

unique_id.description: (string, required) A unique id generated by the device that is creating the token

timestamp.description: (string, required) Unix timestamp indicating the creating date of the token

hash.description: (string, required) The hash that was generated by creating the Loyalty Token

contact_uuid.description: (string, required) The UUID from the contact that claims the Loyalty Token

unit_name.description: (string, required) The name of the unit

unit_value.description: (numeric, required) The number of units (points) you want to issue

tags: OAuth v3 > Clients > Loyalty Transaction Attributes
OAuth v3 > Clients > Loyalty Transaction Attributes

parameters.name: contact_uuid
parameters.description: (string, optional) UUID of the contact for whom loyalty transactions are to be retrieved

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (integer, optional) Number of loyalty transactions to be retrieved (max. 100, default 10)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: (integer, optional) Offset

parameters.name: shop_uuid
parameters.description: (string, optional) UUID of the shop for which loyalty transactions are to be retrieved

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (string, optional) Type of loyalty transactions to be retrieved, options: 'credit_receptions' and 'reward_receptions'. If not set, loyalty transactions of all types are retrieved.

post.summary: Create Top Up Giftcard Portal Session

contact_identifier_value.description: (optional, string) The value of the Contact Identifier with which the transactions is conducted

amount_in_cents.description: (required, integer) The amount for the transaction, in cents (e.g. 10,00 = 1000). Use minus for negative transactions.

shop_uuid.description: (required, string) The UUID of the Shop where the transaction takes place

parameters.description: (integer, optional)

parameters.name: promotion_uuid
parameters.description: (required) The UUID of the promotion for which the Voucher is to be created

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: (required) The number of vouchers to be generated. Max value = 100

parameters.name: contact_uuid
parameters.description: (optional) The Contact's UUID to be linked to this Voucher. If not given, the recipient will need to identify themselves to use the voucher.

parameters.name: expiration_date
parameters.description: (optional) The Vouchers expiration date in ISO 8601 format. Dates are stored in UTC time. If not given, promotion validity rules apply.

parameters.name: activation_date
parameters.description: (optional) The Vouchers activation date in ISO 8601 format. Dates are stored in UTC time. If not given, promotion validity rules apply.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: (string, required)

status.description: (string, optional) Can be either ACTIVE or DEACTIVATED

parameters.description: (number, optional) Contact UUID for whom rewards are to be listed specifically

reward_uuid.description: (string, required) Reward UUID of reward that is to be claimed

post.summary: Push Credit Reception to End Screen

contact_uuid.description: (number, required if contact_identifier_value not set) Contact UUID

contact_identifier_value.description: (number, required if contact_uuid not set) Loyalty Card ID

value.description: (number, required if credits not set) - The value for which credits are to be given, subject to loyalty rules if set on program

unit.description: (number, required if credits not set) - The name of the unit linked to the value

credits.description: (number, required if purchase_amount not set) The number of credits to be given, overrides loyalty rules if set on program

amount_in_cents.description: (required, integer) The amount in cents for the transaction

transaction_id.description: (optional, string) An internal ID for reference

terminal_id.description: (optional, string) Reference to the specific terminal where the transaction was conducted
